languages.text: {n}Человек едва дышит без своего импланта-респиратора: каким-то чудом он пережил эту чудовищную вивисекцию. Однако одного взгляда на разверстые раны на месте вырванной {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментации{/g} достаточно, чтобы понять — смерть лишь вопрос времени. Словно почувствовав ваше присутствие, полумертвец переводит на вас взгляд и судорожно втягивает горячий воздух.{/n} "Дух машины... избави меня..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Человек едва дышит: из-за отсутствия импланта-респиратора он каким-то чудом выжил после чудовищной вивисекции. Однако одного взгляда на развестые раны на месте вырванной аугментации достаточно, чтобы понять — смерть лишь вопрос времени. Словно почувствовав ваше присутствие, полумертвец переводит на вас взгляд и судорожно втягивает горячий воздух.{/n} "Дух машины... избави меня..."

languages.text: {n}The man can barely breathe without his respirator implant. It is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} was ripped out to realise — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."
languages.original_text: {n}Человек едва дышит без своего импланта-респиратора: каким-то чудом он пережил эту чудовищную вивисекцию. Однако одного взгляда на разверстые раны на месте вырванной {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментации{/g} достаточно, чтобы понять — смерть лишь вопрос времени. Словно почувствовав ваше присутствие, полумертвец переводит на вас взгляд и судорожно втягивает горячий воздух.{/n} "Дух машины... избави меня..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The man can barely breathe — with his respirator implant removed, it is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the augment was ripped out to realize — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

languages.text: {n}这个人在失去呼吸器的情况下，几乎已经无法呼吸。他能在这场可怕的活体解剖中幸存下来，简直就是个奇迹。但只消看一眼他身上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}被扯下来造成的缺口，你就会意识到，他的死亡仅仅是个时间问题。这个半死不活的人仿佛感觉到了你的存在。他看着你，猛地吸了一口灼热的空气。{/n}“机魂……救救我吧……”
languages.original_text: {n}The man can barely breathe without his respirator implant. It is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} was ripped out to realise — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人在失去呼吸器的情况下，几乎已经无法呼吸。他能在这场可怕的活体解剖中幸存下来，简直就是个奇迹。但只消看一眼他身上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}被扯下来造成的缺口，你就会意识到，他的死亡仅仅是个时间问题。这个半死不活的人仿佛感觉到了你的存在。他看着你，猛地吸了一口灼热的空气。{/n}“机魂……救救我吧……”

languages.text: {n}El hombre apenas puede respirar sin su implante respiratorio. Es un milagro que haya sobrevivido a la horrenda vivisección, pero con solo echar un vistazo a las enormes heridas de donde le han extraído los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} te das cuenta de que la muerte aquí es cuestión de tiempo. El hombre agonizante te mira, como si hubiera intuido tu presencial, e inhala con dificultad el aire caliente.{/n}«Espíritu máquina... llévame...».
languages.original_text: {n}The man can barely breathe without his respirator implant. It is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} was ripped out to realise — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre apenas puede respirar sin su implante respiratorio. Es un milagro que haya sobrevivido a la horrenda vivisección, pero con solo echar un vistazo a las enormes heridas de donde le han extraído los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} te das cuenta de que la muerte aquí es cuestión de tiempo. El hombre agonizante te mira, como si hubiera intuido tu presencial, e inhala con dificultad el aire caliente.{/n}«Espíritu máquina... llévame...».

languages.text: {n}男は呼吸器インプラントも付けず、かろうじて息をしている。ひどい生体解剖の末に生きているのは奇跡と言っていい。しかし、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメント{/g}を引き剥がされた深い傷をひと目見ただけでわかる…命が尽きるのも時間の問題だ。まるで存在に気づいたように、死の淵を彷徨う男はこちらを見つめ、熱い空気を荒々しく吸い込んだ。{/n}「機械精霊…連れて行って、くれ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The man can barely breathe without his respirator implant. It is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} was ripped out to realise — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は呼吸器インプラントも付けず、かろうじて息をしている。ひどい生体解剖の末に生きているのは奇跡と言っていい。しかし、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメント{/g}を引き剥がされた深い傷をひと目見ただけでわかる…命が尽きるのも時間の問題だ。まるで存在に気づいたように、死の淵を彷徨う男はこちらを見つめ、熱い空気を荒々しく吸い込んだ。{/n}「機械精霊…連れて行って、くれ…」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann kann ohne sein Atemgerät-Implantat kaum atmen. Es ist ein Wunder, dass er die schreckliche Vivisektion überlebt hat. Aber ein Blick auf die klaffenden Wunden, wo die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} herausgerissen wurden, und du weißt – der Tod ist nur eine Frage der Zeit. Als hätte er deine Anwesenheit gespürt, blickt der halbtote Mann dich an und atmet die heiße Luft ein.{/n} "Maschinengeist ... erlöst mich ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The man can barely breathe without his respirator implant. It is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} was ripped out to realise — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann kann ohne sein Atemgerät-Implantat kaum atmen. Es ist ein Wunder, dass er die schreckliche Vivisektion überlebt hat. Aber ein Blick auf die klaffenden Wunden, wo die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} herausgerissen wurden, und du weißt – der Tod ist nur eine Frage der Zeit. Als hätte er deine Anwesenheit gespürt, blickt der halbtote Mann dich an und atmet die heiße Luft ein.{/n} "Maschinengeist ... erlöst mich ..."

languages.text: {n}L'homme peine à respirer sans son implant. Sa survie à l'abominable vivisection tient du miracle, mais un simple coup d'œil aux entailles béantes laissées par l'arrachage brutal de son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} vous suffit pour savoir que sa mort n'est plus qu'une affaire de temps. Comme s'il avait senti votre présence, le moribond vous regarde et prend une brusque inspiration d'air chaud.{/n} « Esprit de la machine... délivre-moi... »
languages.original_text: {n}The man can barely breathe without his respirator implant. It is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} was ripped out to realise — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme peine à respirer sans son implant. Sa survie à l'abominable vivisection tient du miracle, mais un simple coup d'œil aux entailles béantes laissées par l'arrachage brutal de son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} vous suffit pour savoir que sa mort n'est plus qu'une affaire de temps. Comme s'il avait senti votre présence, le moribond vous regarde et prend une brusque inspiration d'air chaud.{/n} « Esprit de la machine... délivre-moi... »

languages.text: {n}Adam, solunum implantı olmadan zar zor nefes alıyor. Korkunç dirikesimden kurtulması mucize olmakla birlikte {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentin{/g} çıkarıldığı açık yaralara attığın tek bir bakışla ölmek üzere olduğunu anlıyorsun. Yarı ölü adam, varlığını hissetmiş gibi sana bakıp bir hışımla sıcak havayı içine çekiyor.{/n} "Makine ruhu... Zahit bizi..."
languages.original_text: {n}The man can barely breathe without his respirator implant. It is a miracle he survived the horrific vivisection. But it takes you a single look at the gaping wounds where the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} was ripped out to realise — death is only a matter of time. As if having sensed your presence, the half-dead man looks at you and sharply inhales the hot air.{/n} "Machine spirit... deliver me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, solunum implantı olmadan zar zor nefes alıyor. Korkunç dirikesimden kurtulması bir mucize ama {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogment{/g}in çıkarıldığı açık yaralara attığın tek bir bakışla anlıyorsun ki ölmesi an meselesi. Yarı ölü adam, varlığını hissetmiş gibi sana bakıp bir hışımla sıcak havayı içine çekiyor.{/n} "Makine ruhu... Zahit bizi..."
